name: Metropolis 3-Top Coffee Table with Shagreen, Shell & Bronze Patina Brass — KIFU PARIS
description: The Metropolis 3-top coffee table by Kifu Paris is a dramatic and sculptural design that demonstrates the incredible and signature artisanale work from her Augousti genes. The bronze-patina brass base of the coffee table is conceptually inspired by the skyline of cosmopolitan cities. The tops are inlaid in a mixture of cream shagreen, black Shagreen and black pen shell with a subtle metal indentation detail. This piece comes as a console table and side table variations.Design SKU reference KCF05The approximate dimensions of this piece are 102.5 x 113 x 51 cmAll Kifu Paris pieces are handmade by artisans, ultimately making each piece uniqueCustom color/sizing available on requestWipe clean with soft dry clothMade in Philippines
